li.label: numbness and tingling
li.description: I can't feel parts of my body the way I used to. It's so strange... like I'm half-disconnected from myself.

li.label: limited mobility
li.description: Moving is difficult and frustrating. I feel trapped in my own body, and even simple tasks are exhausting.

li.label: complete paralysis
li.description: I can't move. My body won't respond, no matter how hard I try. I'm like a vegetable - locked inside myself. Nothing will ever be the same again.
